So I just binge-played this and the original Portal. Both absolutely phenomenal games you absolutely must get. I did prefer Portal 1 though.

The mentality of P1 was: Here is A. There is B. How tf do I get to B?

The mentality of roughly 1/3 of P2 was: Here is A. Where tf is B.

Also, the final levels of both games felt a bit repetitive.

I have a few gripes with the games, but they're still the best games I've ever played. Get them as a bundle, and on sale if you can.

Awsome game <3

This is the second time I beat the game. The first time I beat the game was back in 2011 on the PS3. Back then I loved it and it was honestly one of the best gaming experiences I had. Saw the game on summer sale, bought it, and man... This game that now is about 5 years old STILL beats a lot of recent AAA games. It's perfect in every way.

The story is interesting, you don't need to have played the first Portal game to understand what's going on. You actually care about the characters, even yourself (you never speak). And the physics. Oh my god is it on point. The satisfaction from traveling through the air bouncing of a blue gel. Going though portals.

Now there is a downside... ish... Not really a bad thing but I beat the game in 7 hours, which I assume is average. So there is "only" 7 hours of main story play time. Well, depends on if you're better or worse at the game obviously. But there is a little PC exclusive thing in this game that makes up for that. That is Community Levels. And well, they're levels built by the community. That should add a lot of play time. There is also a (not PC exclusive) CO-OP mode! It's neat since the robots you and your friend play as are in the main story aswell, although not actually that important for the story line.

I think you should pick this game up and play it as soon as you can. I love it, a bunch of other people love it, you will love it.

(Sorry if my grammar wasn't very good. I'm Swedish)

As a person i am easily wowed by things and recreations of scenes from the past. Thats i feel Portal Stories:Mel was so D*** good. But when i played through the portal 2 campaign for the first time and fell into Old Aperture, lets just say i couldnt stop being amazed while playing. The story line is easily 40506356305467 times better than any other game ive seen or played *including portal 1* and so the rise and fall of Aperture was just one of my favorite things in the series. Valve, give yourself a pat on the back. You did amazing 6 years ago, and 2010-11 was pretty much the launch of the major success of multiple games, including the stanley parable as well.

The attack on Pearl Harbor was a surprise, but Japan and the United States had been edging toward war for decades. The United States was particularly unhappy with Japan’s increasingly belligerent attitude toward China. The Japanese government believed that the only way to solve its economic and demographic problems was to expand into its neighbor’s territory and take over its import market; to this end, Japan had declared war on China in 1937. American officials responded to this aggression with a battery of economic sanctions and trade embargoes. They reasoned that without access to money and goods, and especially essential supplies like oil, Japan would have to rein in its expansionism. Instead, the sanctions made the Japanese more determined to stand their ground. During months of negotiations between Tokyo and Washington, D.C., neither side would budge. It seemed that war was inevitable.

Мне кажется лишнее слова тут излишни, все мы знаем что это за игра и знаем как много она значит для каждого. В смысле ты не играл в Portal ? А в Half - Life ? Тоже нет? Стой, ты вообще не любишь головоломки? Ты чего? Позволь мне тебя переубедить!
      Во первых, Portal - это про развлечение, это не скучная мозговыжималка, она просто просит тебя поднапрячь свой мозг, что бы ты получил удовольствие от выполненной задачи.
      Во вторых, Portal - это про смех, тут отличный юмор, без глупых шуток с неловким подтекстом, всё стерильно и мило
      В третьих, Portal - это про отличный сюжет. Наверное если ты решился зайти ты решил что это "как шахматы" или "Типо кубика Рубика" и ты будешь не прав. Помнишь как в детстве как дедушка твою, тебя малого в шашки учил играть, да ещё и байки рассказывал,  так вот это почти Portal
      Ты ещё не купил? Чего же ты ждешь?

В заключение скажу игра просто отличная 10 из 10

И так, если вы читаете обзоры, значит вы хотите купить Portal 2
Сюжет:
Сюжет не изменился с первого Portal. Только добавили мультиплеер. Теперь можно проходить Portal в 2, и это круто.

Гемплей:
Гемплей не изменился с первого Portal. Ставь порталы, решай головоломки, сохраняйся, убей босса.

Плюсы и Минусы этой игры.

Плюсы:
1)Собственный сюжет для мультиплеера.
2)Сложные головоломки
3)Имеется редактор уровней

Минусы:
Я их не нашёл

Моё мнение:
Это серия игр, мне очень приглянулась. Классикой можно назвать. Свой сюжет, свой мир, зто замечательно.

A fantastic game. Great continuation of the plot from the first Portal, with very entertaining dialogue from both Wheatley and GLaDOS. The story is pretty long and becomes the tiniest bit tedious at times, but overall it is worth it. As always, love the song in the end credits! Very cute! Additionally, the co-op is extremely fun, and a little more challenging as it is somewhat more complex than the challenges from single-player. Community chambers allow for players to have something to keep coming back to without getting bored. Fantastic game!!

[h1]Portal 2 Review[/h1]
[b]by KTMboyz[/b]

[i]"You might have a very minor case of serious brain damage..."[/i]

Portal 2 is a sequel done right, by the gods of sequels, Valve, who are the worst at third installments, if you know what I mean.  I really enjoyed the first portal.  It made me rethink what was possible to do in a game and had me laughing a few times too.  All in all, it felt like a DLC to Half-Life 2; they are in the same universe anyway.  On the other hand, Portal 2 felt like a fresh/new experience ready for me to invest more hours into.  With an awesome intro, Portal 2 had me hooked from the very beginning, it had trickier puzzles, a better interface and more laugh out loud moments than before, most of which came from the multiplayer.  Adding multiplayer/coop into the game was probably one of the better decisions when making Portal 2.  I found myself laughing my  ass  off with my friend as we went through the suprisingly challenging courses by the creators and even the community!  All in all Portal 2 will most definetly keep you entertained through its really good campaign about testing stuff, once again.  And the multiplayer will keep you satisfied and laughing for years to come.  I highly recommend this title.

[h1]9.9/10[/h1]

Really kicked up the anti in this one. Trick-shots, nagging robots, and a new AI for aperture science gives you both the story and the challenge you were always looking for

Die Story ist witzig, ja.
Der Humor ist großartig, ja!
Die Grafik ist völlig OK, aber ausnahmsweise kommt es auf die Grafik nicht an.

Worauf es ankommt, sind die Rätsel, die man lösen muss und die im Spiel "Tests" heißen. Man kommt in eine Testkammer, man hat nichts als die Portalkanone und seinen Verstand, und man muss aus dem Raum wieder rausfinden.
Dieses Spiel hat einen so extremen Suchtfaktor, wie ich es noch nie erlebt habe. Ich habe Nächte gehabt mit sehr wenig Schlaf, weil ich wusste: Es gibt eine Lösung, es gibt einen Weg zum Ausgang. Ich muss ihn eben nur finden.

Ein perfektes, ein geniales Spiel. 11/10. Kaufen!
